topics.title: Circuit Analysis
topics.description: Analyzing the circuit behavior and identifying key components
evidence_quotes: [00:05:40.800 → 00:05:46.800] We can represent our system in state-space form.
[00:09:12.840 → 00:09:17.840] So when you go counterclockwise here, you are going against the current through Vc.

topics.title: Output Equation
topics.description: The speaker derives an equation for the output y as C times x plus D times U.
evidence_quotes: The equation for the output, which is y, will be C times x plus D times U.

topics.title: State Space Representation
topics.description: The speaker writes the derived equations in the standard state space representation using A and B matrices.
evidence_quotes: So now let's complete the third row here.

topics.title: State-Space Representation
topics.description: Extracting state-space representation equations from the circuit analysis
evidence_quotes: [00:09:51.600 → 00:09:57.840] This equation is perfect because we have everything here as a function of the states.

topics.title: VL Output Expression
topics.description: The speaker derives an expression for the output VL as Vc minus Ri1, and shows it in state space variables.
evidence_quotes: So VL, the output, becomes Vc minus Ri1.
